pageContext.claim: “I get along, I think really fantastically, with the head of every country [at G-20].”
pageContext.analysis: Since the president announced he would pull the U.S. out of the Paris Climate Accord, many European leaders, including the president of France and {German chancellor}, have publicly distanced themselves from Trump. It's certainly a stretch to suggest that relations between the U.S. and Europe are as strong as they have ever been.
